# AVCaptureIndexPicker

**Class**

A control for selecting from a set of mutually exclusive values by index.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVCaptureIndexPicker
```

## Overview

Index pickers are appropriate for controls that provide an indexed container of values.

## Creating an index picker

- **init(_:symbolName:numberOfIndexes:)**: Creates a control to pick a value from the specified number of indexes.
- **init(_:symbolName:numberOfIndexes:localizedTitleTransform:)**: Creates a control to pick a value from the specified number of indices.
- **init(_:symbolName:localizedIndexTitles:)**: Creates an object to select an index from a set of values.

## Handling interaction

- **setActionQueue(_:action:)**: Sets the action to perform on the specified dispatch queue when the control’s value changes.

## Accessing the control value

- **selectedIndex**: The currently selected index.
- **numberOfIndexes**: The number of index values the control provides.

## Setting an accessibility identifier

- **accessibilityIdentifier**: A string identifier for this control.

## Inspecting presentation attributes

- **symbolName**: The name of the SF Symbol that represents this control.
- **localizedTitle**: A localized title that describes the control’s action.
- **localizedIndexTitles**: The titles to present for each index.

## Capture controls

- **Enhancing your app experience with the Camera Control**: Provide direct access to your camera app’s features to help people quickly capture the perfect shot.
- **AVCaptureControl**: An abstract base class for controls that interact with the camera system.
- **AVCaptureSystemZoomSlider**: A control that adjusts the video zoom factor of a capture device within the system-recommended range.
- **AVCaptureSystemExposureBiasSlider**: A control that adjusts the exposure bias of a capture device within the system-recommended range.
- **AVCaptureSlider**: A slider control that selects a value from a bounded range.

## Inherits From

- AVCaptureControl

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
